## Source: ossf-package-analysis (81c073683277444cc82216b47de3758bb6fc20065d1220076e08d5bd84270ad5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'os-apps-ui-creative-manager' @ 99.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
